content: The Rat Governor fights like the other enemies of his kind throughout Yellow Wind Ridge. His main go-to attacks include summoning lightning strikes with his staff and using it to beat you around. The location is kind of difficult to traverse, so luring him up further to a flatter area could help if you're having trouble taking him down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Governor_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Governor Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Governor Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Governor fights like the other enemies of his kind throughout Yellow Wind Ridge. His main go-to attacks include summoning lightning strikes with his staff and using it to beat you around. The location is kind of difficult to traverse, so luring him up further to a flatter area could help if you're having trouble taking him down.
